title: Facebook has a coronavirus problem. It's WhatsApp.

title: Facebook wants to convince the naysayers that social distancing applies to them too
text:
The company is launching a coronavirus information center and giving the WHO and CDC free ads and prominent placement at the top of Instagram and Facebook. 
Facebook announced that it is launching a “coronavirus center” with articles and information from public health officials, health organizations, politicians, celebrities, and news organizations.

title: Facebook will put a new coronavirus info center on top of the News Feed

title: Facebook built a new center to direct people to accurate coronavirus information
text: The new coronavirus information center will appear at the top of your News Feed.

title: Facebook to feature COVID-19 information resource at top of users' feed
text: Facebook Inc. on Wednesday said it will place a coronavirus information center at the top of everyone's Facebook feed over the next 24 hours to share authoritative information from the CDC, WHO, and other health-care experts on the pandemic.

title: Facebook giving $1K bonuses amid coronavirus crisis
